name: mcp-fred
description: Model Context Protocol server for Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED) API
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server providing access to all FRED API endpoints with intelligent large data handling, project-based storage, and async job processing. Includes 12 MCP tools covering 50+ FRED API endpoints for categories, releases, series, sources, tags, and geographic maps. Features conservative token estimation, automatic file saving for large datasets, and background job processing for very large datasets.

tools.name: fred_category
tools.description: Get FRED category information, child categories, related categories, series in a category, and category tags

tools.name: fred_release
tools.description: Get FRED release information, release dates, series in a release, sources, tags, and release tables

tools.name: fred_series
tools.description: Get series metadata, observations (data points), categories, release info, search series, get tags, updates, and vintage dates

tools.name: fred_source
tools.description: Get data source information and releases associated with a source

tools.name: fred_tag
tools.description: Get tag information, related tags, and series associated with tags

tools.name: fred_maps
tools.description: Get GeoFRED map shapes, series groups, and regional data for geographic visualizations

tools.name: fred_project_create
tools.description: Create a new project workspace for organizing FRED data files

tools.name: fred_project_list
tools.description: List all FRED data projects with file counts and storage metadata

tools.name: fred_job_status
tools.description: Check the status of a background job processing large FRED datasets

tools.name: fred_job_list
tools.description: List recent or active background jobs

fred_api_key.title: FRED API Key
fred_api_key.description: Your Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED) API key. Get a free API key from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/docs/api/api_key.html

storage_directory.title: Storage Directory
storage_directory.description: Directory where FRED data files will be stored. Projects and datasets will be organized within this directory.

output_format.title: Output Format
output_format.description: Default output format for data files. Enter 'csv' or 'json'.
